name: Block Crushing Game

Welcome to Block crushing game—————————————————————————————————————————————Devlog:https://itch.io/blog/510429/block-crushing-game-announcement-blog

How to play:

use mouse to drop bomb.

press C key to hold [to replace the next bomb with a bomb you are holding(if holding block is none,replace with the 2nd next bomb)]

Note:Once you hold, you cannot use hold again unless you drop any bomb.

↓1   ↓2                                                                                                                                     

1.Currently cost you have

Every you drop any bombs,you consume certain amount(shown upper right of the block) of costs.

In addition,cost will be attenuated.

When costs drop to 0, new blocks appear from the bottom.

2.kind of the the bomb you will drop from the next bomb ,up to the 5th next bomb.

For Example , in this picture,you will drop the next Normal bomb ,which destroy 3x3 block near it.And you will 4th drop Vertical arrow,witch destroy blocks located in a vertical line.

3.HOLD 

You can see what kind of bomb you are holding.If you want to use it,you can pull out by pressing C key.

notes:

(Use of coin are not added.)

Note that “Share” button( ,which you can share your game result(your score ,coins you earned and level you reached) on twitter) can’t be used.

Game Over

when piled up the above for a few seconds, Game Over.
